query.value:
SELECT	14 as HSO_DnA_SourceConnectionID,
		12 as HSO_DnA_TargetMappingID, 
		CURDATE() as HSO_DnA_InsertDateTime, 
		CURDATE() as HSO_DnA_UpdateDateTime, 
		 #_of_closed_revenue_line_items,
       #_of_total_revenue_line_items,
       account_id,
       account_name,
       actual_closed_date,
       branch,
       branch_id_field,
       campaign_id,
       campaign_name,
       competitor_1_id,
       competitor_1_name,
       competitor_2_id,
       competitor_2_name,
       date_created,
       date_modified,
       gratitude_points,
       holon,
       id,
       invest_opp_id,
       invest_opp_name,
       likely,
       next_step,
       next_step_due_date,
       opp_country,
       opp_name,
       opp_probability,
       opp_status,
       opp_total_potential,
       opp_type,
       other_industry,
       primary_distributor,
       primary_industry,
       region,
       reportable_comment_log,
       rli_expected_close_date,
       sum_of_rlis,
       sum_of_rlis_won,
       user_id,
       user_name
FROM NL_BYOD_OPP
